title: Hollywood: the dream factory
creator_credit: Bud Friedgen, Irwin Rosten and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Uses clips from MGM feature films made during the 1930’s-1950’s to exemplify what the Hollywood movie industry was like before its major studios suffered financial breakdown and the star system fell apart. Narrated by Dick Cavett. Suitable for upper secondary level
